/wiki/Hern\u00e1n_Buenahora: Hernán Buenahora Gutíerrez ( born March 18 , 1967 in Barichara , Santander ) is a Colombian road racing cyclist , who was nicknamed El Cabrito de Barichara during his career . He turned professional in 1990 and placed 18th in the 1994 Tour de France , 10th in the 1995 Tour , 22nd in the 1997 Tour , and 64th in the 1999 Tour . Riding in the 2006-2007 UCI America Tour events , Buenahora won the overall titles of the Clasico Ciclistico Banfoandes and the Vuelta al Táchira and rides for the Gobernación del Zulia - Alcaldía de Cabimas cycling team . In the prior season , he had been disqualified in the Vuelta al Colombia when , whilst leading the race , he had a non-negative doping control .
/wiki/Juan_Diego_Ram\u00edrez: Juan Diego Ramírez Calderón ( born July 21 , 1971 in La Ceja , Antioquia ) is a male road cyclist from Colombia .
/wiki/Jairo_Hern\u00e1ndez_(cyclist): Jairo de Jesús Hernández Montoya ( born August 13 , 1972 in Calarcá , Quindío ) is a male professional track and road cyclist from Colombia .
/wiki/H\u00e9ctor_Casta\u00f1o: Héctor Manuel Castaño Betancurt ( born January 23 , 1965 in Itagüí , Antioquia ) is a retired male professional road cyclist from Colombia .
/wiki/Noel_Vasquez: Noel Armando Vásquez Mendoza ( born October 19 , 1976 in Capacho ) is a Venezuelan former professional racing cyclist .
/wiki/Alexis_Rojas: José Alexis Rojas Díaz ( born August 9 , 1972 in Bogotá ) is a retired male road racing cyclist from Colombia .
/wiki/Ubaldo_Mesa: Ubaldo Mesa Estepa ( November 20 , 1973 in Nobsa - October 9 , 2005 in San Cristóbal ) was a male professional road cyclist from Colombia . He was the younger brother of Urbelino Mesa . Mesa died from heart failure at age 31 after collapsing before a race .
/wiki/Israel_Ochoa: Israel Antonio Ochoa Plazas ( born August 26 , 1964 in Paipa ) is a retired male professional racing cyclist from Colombia , who was nicknamed El Rápido during his career .
/wiki/Ismael_Sarmiento: José Ismael Sarmiento Riaño ( born July 15 , 1973 in Cómbita , Boyacá ) is a retired male road cyclist from Colombia . He was nicknamed Pocholo during his career .
/wiki/Marlon_P\u00e9rez: Marlon Alirio Pérez Arango ( born January 10 , 1976 in Medellín ) is a Colombian road bicycle racer who rides for Colombia-Comcel . Pérez previously rode for UCI ProTour team Caisse d'Epargne .
